title: GraphicsMode
content:

name: GraphicsMode
type: enum
summary: |
  Used to set the graphics API that Roblox uses to render the game.
description: |
  Used to set the graphics API that Roblox uses to render the game.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Automatic
    summary: |
      Roblox will automatically decide what graphics mode to use, depending on
      what best suits your device's specifications.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Direct3D11
    summary: |
      Direct3D Version 11 (Microsoft).
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: OpenGL
    summary: |
      OpenGL (Khronos Group).
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Metal
    summary: |
      Metal (Apple).
    value: 5
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Vulkan
    summary: |
      Vulkan (Khronos Group).
    value: 6
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: NoGraphics
    summary: |
      Game will not be rendered, and instead a Diagnostics window is rendered
      on screen.
    value: 9
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
